Name: Endor
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
Hey Mitty! I wish I could find the words to fully express just how thankful I am for finding you. Because of you, I've improved my art skills tremendously, made many amazing friends, and had lots of laughs. You're the sweetest little bean I've had the pleasure of watching. We love you just as much as you love us, and on this special day, we'll show you how much love that truly is.
Happy Valentines, Mitty.

Name: Konsulus
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s: Hi Mitty. I hope you have a great valentines day. And thank you for spending so much time with us. Thanks to you I can enjoy some games I would never play myself. Joining you on your travels is a pleasure and I hope it will continue for a long time.

Name: Necrozma
Message to Mitty (500 or fewer letters/s:
Happy Valentine's day, Mitty! 

You are the sweetest most awesome person to us lucky charms, so I got you equally sweet and awesome chocolate! You work so hard to do incredible things for us, and you always put a big smile on my face, so I hope today you can feel all the love the lucky charms have for you! And don't worry, I checked that the chocolate is real this time, just don't ask where I got it from, lots of love Mitty! Byeeeee!
